Package index

Donations

get_donations()
Get all donations for an event from the tracker
get_donation_page()
Get a single page from the tracker
update_tracker_donations()
Update donation data from GDQ tracker
augment_donations()
Augment GDQ donation data with additional variables
assemble_donations()
Aggregate all donation data from the tracker in one file

Runs

get_runs()
Get runs from GDQ tracker
update_tracker_runs()
Update run data from GDQ tracker
summarize_runs()
Summarize GDQ tracker run data by event
assemble_runs()
Update all runs from GDQ tracker

Scraping Helpers

tracker_run_index()
Get GDQ tracker event overview
get_page_count()
Get page count of GDQ tracker
latest_event()
Get the latest event
